title: 50 Camels and She's Yours
description: This anthology is aimed at travellers of all styles: armchair, wishful thinkers and adventurers alike. It is particularly aimed at people who think, 'I wish I could do that!' Come with us and be inspired by the extraordinary journeys of five ordinary women: two medical doctors, a teacher, an accountant and a psychotherapist as they travel the five continents.
author: Francoise Hivernel
